sen.j: 醍醐駅（だいごえき）は、京都市伏見区醍醐高畑町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄東西線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Daigo Takahata-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Daigo Station is a stop on the Tozai Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
sen.cmt: ”京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄”：”京都市営地下鉄”がだぶっていると考え、一方を削除したとして訳してあります。
sen.e: Daigo Station, located in Daigo Takahata-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Tozai Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Daigo Station, located in Daigo Takahata-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Tozai Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.

sen.j: 駅番号はT03。
sen.e: The Station number is T03.
The station number is T03.
The station number is T03.

sen.j: ホームは1面2線の島式。
sen.e: An island platform serving two tracks
It has an island platform serving two tracks.
It has an island platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: ホームドアが設置されている。
sen.e: Platform screen doors are provided.
Platform screen doors are provided.
Platform screen doors are provided.

sen.j: 東西線の駅は駅ごとにステーションカラーが制定されているが、醍醐駅のステーションカラーは桜色。
sen.e: A color is designated for each station on Tozai Line, and the color for Daigo Station is pink.
A color is designated for each station on the Tozai Line, and the color for Daigo Station is pink.
A color is designated for each station on the Tozai Line, and the color for Daigo Station is pink.

sen.j: 駅上には、バスターミナルがあり京阪バスが発着している。
sen.e: On the ground level above the station, a bus terminal for buses of Keihan Bus Co., Ltd (Keihan buses) is located
On the ground level above the station, there is a bus terminal for the buses of Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. (Keihan buses).
On the ground level above the station, there is a bus terminal for the buses of Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. (Keihan buses).

sen.j: またこの駅をターミナルとして、醍醐コミュニティバスが地域を網羅した路線を走らせている。
sen.e: The Daigo community bus service, which uses this station as the terminal, covers every area of the community.
The Daigo community bus service, which uses this station as its terminal, covers every area of the community.
The Daigo community bus service, which uses this station as its terminal, covers every area of the community.

sen.j: 開業当初は定期券売り場もあったが、六地蔵駅への路線延伸と同時に閉鎖された。
sen.e: A counter for selling commuter tickets was provided initially when operation of this station started, but when the line was extended up to Rokujizo Station, the counter was closed.
A counter for the sale of commuter tickets was initially provided when this station became operational, but the counter was closed when the line was extended up to Rokujizo Station.
A counter for the sale of commuter tickets was initially provided when this station became operational, but the counter was closed when the line was extended up to Rokujizo Station.

sen.j: エレベーターはフジテック製が採用されている。
sen.e: An elevator from Fujitec Co.,Ltd. is used.
An elevator from Fujitec Co., Ltd., is in use.
An elevator from Fujitec Co., Ltd., is in use.

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 駅周辺は団地が多い。
sen.e: There are many housing complexes around the station.
There are many housing complexes around the station.
There are many housing complexes around the station.

sen.j: パセオダイゴロー東館・西館
sen.e: The east and west buildings of Paseo Daigoro
The east and west buildings of Paseo Daigoro
The east and west buildings of Paseo Daigoro

sen.j: 西館の地下に東西線の醍醐車庫がある。
sen.e: The Daigo rail yard is locatd in the underground of the west building.
The Daigo rail yard is located in the underground of the west building.
The Daigo rail yard is located in the underground of the west building.

sen.j: 醍醐寺
sen.e: Daigo-ji Temple
Daigo-ji Temple
Daigo-ji Temple

sen.j: 京都外環状線
sen.e: Kyoto Outer Ring Road
Kyoto Outer Ring Road
Kyoto Outer Loop Expressway

sen.j: 伏見区役所醍醐支所（醍醐総合庁舎）
sen.e: Fushimi Ward Office, Daigo Branch (the integrated Digo office)
Fushimi Ward Office, Daigo Branch (the integrated Daigo office)
Fushimi Ward Office, Daigo Branch (the integrated Daigo office)

sen.j: 京阪バスのターミナルである。
sen.e: It is a bus terminal for Keihan buses.
It's a bus terminal for Keihan buses.
It's a bus terminal for Keihan buses.

sen.j: ヤサカバスの醍醐コミュニティバスは、ここで待機したり構内を通過する事はあるが、乗降の場としては使用していない。
sen.e: The Daigo community buses, operated by Yasaka Bus Co.,Ltd., sometimes wait here or pass this terminal stop, but do not use it as a place where passengers get on or off.
The Daigo community buses, operated by Yasaka Bus Co., Ltd., sometimes wait here or pass this terminal stop, but they don't use it for passenger boarding or de-boarding.
The Daigo community buses, operated by Yasaka Bus Co., Ltd., sometimes wait here or pass this terminal stop, but they don't use it for passenger boarding or de-boarding.

sen.j: なお、これとは別に約200m離れた位置に醍醐駅バス停留所もある。
sen.e: In addition, the Daigo Station bus stop is located about 200 m apart from this bus terminal.
Additionally, the Daigo Station bus stop is located about 200 meters from this bus terminal.
Additionally, the Daigo Station bus stop is located about 200 meters from this bus terminal.

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）10月12日 東西線醍醐～二条間開業時に同線の起点駅として設置。
sen.e: October 12, 1997: When Tozai Line started its operation between Daigo and Nijo, this station was established as a starting station on the line.
October 12, 1997: When the Tozai Line started operating between Daigo and Nijo, this station was established as a starting station on the line.
October 12, 1997: When the Tozai Line started operating between Daigo and Nijo, this station was established as a starting station on the line.

sen.j: 2004年（平成16年）11月26日 東西線が六地蔵駅まで延伸、中間駅となる。
sen.e: November 26, 2004: When Tozai Line extended its operation up to Rokujizo Station, this station stopped being a terminal.
November 26, 2004: When the Tozai Line extended its operation up to Rokujizo Station, this station ceased functioning as a terminal.
November 26, 2004: When the Tozai Line extended its operation up to Rokujizo Station, this station ceased functioning as a terminal.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became usable.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became usable.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became usable.

sen.j: かつて当駅の付近に京都市営バス醍醐営業所（バス停名は醍醐車庫前）が存在したが、東西線の開業と同時に廃止され、跡地はマンションになっている（同時に山科・醍醐地区から京都市営バスが撤退）。
sen.e: In the past, Kyoto City Bus Daigo Eigyosho (Daigo business office) is located near to this station (the bus station was named Daigo Shako-mae (in front of the Daigo rail yard), but its operation was discontinued when Tozai Line started its operation, and now a condominium stands there (at the same timing, Kyoto City Bus stopped its operation in the Yamashina and Daigo areas).

In the past, Kyoto City Bus Daigo Eigyosho (Daigo business office) was located near to this station (the bus station was called Daigo Shako-mae (in front of the Daigo rail yard), but its operation was discontinued when the Tozai Line started its operation, and now a condominium stands there (concurrently, Kyoto City Bus stopped operating in the Yamashina and Daigo areas).
